name: The Fold Guest House

reviews.text: Stayed here for 1 night. What a lovely welcome we had. Really pleasant. Rooms lovely and bed really really comfy. Great breakfast, even given extra on a plate. Great price too. Owners are lovely people. Would defo recommend. Much nicer than some hotels around the area. And great views of the mountains too.
reviews.title: Fantastic B & B, defo stay again for sure, lovely lovely owners.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: When people say nothing is as good the second time they obviously haven't been to The Fold in Kirksanton. This was our second visit to this superb guesthouse and it was as memorable a stay as the first time we stayed.
reviews.title: How it should be done

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Kev and Rachelle are the most welcoming and attentive hosts as you could ever wish to come across nothing is too much trouble. The rooms are lovely with an attention to detail you would expect to find in a hotel twice the price.
reviews.title: First Class

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast at The Fold is one of the best I have tasted with locally sourced produce of the highest quality and Rachelles mum's home made jam is superb.
reviews.title: The perfect guesthouse

reviews.text: If you visit Kirksanton two things are a must, the beach is stunning and a must see. The local pub The King Billy serves superb steaks at a reasonable price, but you might need a jumper on a cold evening as it is somewhat cool, alternatively take a log or 2 for the fire.
reviews.title: Fab Guest House, Fab Food, Fab Location, Fab Owners!

reviews.text: After spending 1 night at The Fold I can honestly say I would go back and recommend to others. Very pleasant people, beautiful house and garden and the room was stunning! Extremely clean and comfortable.. Deffo go back in the future!
reviews.title: Delightful place to stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from 3 wonderful days at the Fold guest house absolutely fabulous. This is a guest house not to be missed on a stay in the Lakes. Food first class and every need catered for including vegetarians. Our hosts were the best. We will for sure be back.
reviews.title: Top class bed and beakfast

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: best ever guest house.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: very welcoming friendly owners.exellent evening meal and breakfast.we felt very relaxed comfortable. loved the location.great views.lovely clean bedroom and en-suite.will go again.pub 5mins walk away.good luck for the future.from niel @ barbara.
reviews.title: Must stay guest house

description: Come visit us at our 18th century cottage in this idyllic part of the South Lakes. Situated at the foothills of Balckcombe and Whicham valley - gateway to the Lake District National Park. The historic hamlet of Kirksanton with its own standing stone's is ideal for a peaceful relaxing break for either business or pleasure, minutes walk away from our unspoilt blue flag beach which runs alongside the Cumbrian way. Enjoy a meal at our local pub, just a few minutes walk down the lane. Retire to our well furnished bedrooms for a relaxing nights sleep. Our hearty full cooked English breakfast will prepare you for all the attractions the South Lakes has to offer.
